title: Make this skin possible please!
body: I have found this picture while looking for zed pictures and wow it honestly took my breath away please could you make this become apart of zeds armada of skins? he only has a couple when many other champs have many skins to choose from and if this skin were to be used i know many of my friends and players on lol that would buy this with rp and it would honestly be well worth your time and you would get great return in profit from it, so please make this work and happen and thank you for this awesome game, cheers! Dom

replies.body: I would instantly buy this skin if it got released.
That's almost impossible. Riot has an order when it comes to skins. This pic has been put around the board on A lot of servers, so higly unlikely
